mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, t1.* from (select substr(chart_id, 6) chartdate , pulse, weight, BLOOD_PRESSURE, pee, memo , (select staff_name from staff where staff_id = tc.staff_id) staff_name , chart_id , (select patient_name from patient where patient_id = #{patientId} ) patient_name from health_chart tc where PATIENT_ID = #{patientId} order by chart_id desc ) t1 ) t2 where rn =1
SELECT CHART_ID, PATIENT_ID, PULSE ,WEIGHT,BLOOD_PRESSURE,PEE,COMMENT,STAFF_ID FROM health_chart WHERE CHART_ID=#{chartId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO health_chart (CHART_ID, PATIENT_ID, PULSE ,WEIGHT,BLOOD_PRESSURE,PEE,COMMENT,STAFF_ID) VALUES (#{chartId}, #{patientId}, #{pulse}, #{weight}, #{bloodPressure}, #{pee}, #{comment}, #{staffId})
